name: Sanguo Warriors VR
detailed_description:
This is a VR game of the cold wind weapon game of the Three Kingdoms theme in the China Wind Age. We hope it will eventually become a Roguelike type RPG.
We redesigned the game vision, operation, movement, and interactive experience based on VR features.
There are various RPG classic systems such as experience, level, currency, props, weapons, and skills. There are basic games such as weapon shop, war sand table, story level, and BOSS challenge. If you read the instructions carefully, the game still has an egg barrier.
Now is the basic game demo. We are trying to create a randomly generated level and monster system, and continue to enrich the game scene, monsters, bosses, weapons, and skills.
Due to limited manpower, Chinese and other languages will be updated in the next version.
about_the_game:
This is a VR game of the cold wind weapon game of the Three Kingdoms theme in the China Wind Age. We hope it will eventually become a Roguelike type RPG.
We redesigned the game vision, operation, movement, and interactive experience based on VR features.
There are various RPG classic systems such as experience, level, currency, props, weapons, and skills. There are basic games such as weapon shop, war sand table, story level, and BOSS challenge. If you read the instructions carefully, the game still has an egg barrier.
Now is the basic game demo. We are trying to create a randomly generated level and monster system, and continue to enrich the game scene, monsters, bosses, weapons, and skills.

short_description: This is a VR game developed by the Chinese team champions league win network technology co., LTD. We are constantly refining and optimizing it. The game tells the story of gamers passing through time and space and fighting ancient Chinese famous military commanders. You can use dozens of ancient Chinese classic weapons to fight them, and you can also get a traditional RPG experience that upgrades and defeats equipment in different difficulty levels.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 5 1400 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD RX 480 8GB or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 8GB / AMD RX Vega 56 8GB
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
